bibl.author: Ferdinand von Mueller
bibl.title: 11/10/94. ¶ ¶ You will probably think, dear Mr Tepper, that I only turn to you when I want something; but you are certainly always so busy yourself that you probably also only add to your obligations...

encodingDesc.p: The file data/letters/1890-6/1894/94-10-11a-final.doc was converted from Microsoft Word format into TEI using an XProc pipeline.

head.supplied: 11/10/94. ¶ ¶ You will probably think, dear Mr Tepper, that I only turn to you when I want something; but you are certainly always so busy yourself that you probably also only add to your obligations...

div.p: RB MSS M198, Library, Royal Botanic Gardens Melbourne.

p.seg: Sie werden wohl denken, lieber Herr Tepper, dass ich mich nur an Sie wende, wenn ich etwas wünsche; aber Sie sind ja immer selbst so beschäftigt, dass Sie wohl auch nur noch zu Ihren Obliegenheiten hinzufügen, wenn es wirkich einen Zweck hat.

So möchte ich diesmal nur fragen, ob durch Ihre gütige Vermittlung ich vom Wasser Departement dort gedruckte Rapporte über artesische Borungen erhalten könnte, welche Auskunft aus diesen Colonien ein wissenschaftlicher Freund in Canada zu erhalten wünscht.

p.style: font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;
p.seg: Sie ehrend und Ihnen alles Gute wünschend

p.style: font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;
font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;

div.p: You will probably think, dear Mr Tepper, that I only turn to you when I want something; but you are certainly always so busy yourself that you probably also only add to your obligations when it really has a purpose.

So this time I would like just to ask whether I could get printed reports about artesian borings from the Water Department there through your good offices, which information a scientific friend in Canada wishes to receive from these colonies.
ie. A. Selwyn. See G. Dawson to M, 31 December 1894 (in this edition as 94-12-31a).

p.style: font-family: Geneva; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in; font-size: 10pt;

div.p: Respectfully and wishing you every good thing

p.style: font-family: Geneva; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in; font-size: 10pt;
font-family: Geneva; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in; font-size: 10pt;
